name: Flame Dart
description: On crit: Smoldering.
notes: Smoldering: This condition does nothing on its own, though some spells and abilities have additional effects against Smoldering creatures.

name: Pyroclasm
description: Others within Reach take damage on a failed DEX save. Half damage on save. Smoldering creatures fail.
notes: Defend: If you've already Defended this round, you can't use abilities requiring it again (even for free).

name: Heart's Fire
description: Give an ally within Range an extra action. Spend 1 mana to cast this when it is not your turn.

name: Ignite
description: Ends the Smoldering condition on hit.

name: Enchant Weapon
description: A weapon you touch is enchanted with magical flame. It deals +KEY damage and inflicts Smoldering on crit.

name: Flame Barrier
description: Until the start of your next turn, melee attackers against you take KEY damage (ignoring armor) and gain Smoldering.

name: Fiery Embrace
description: While within Reach: 1 ally gains the effects of Enchant Weapon. Enemies gain Smoldering, lose damage resistance, and their damage immunity is reduced to resistance.

name: Living Inferno
description: Gain the effects of Flame Barrier until your next turn. At the end of this turn and your next turn, cast Pyroclasm for free.

name: Dragonform
description: Transform into a Huge dragon. Gain 3 actions, a fly speed of 12, LVL Armor, 10xLVL temp HP, and: Tooth & Claw (Action, Reach 2, 1d20+LVL damage ignoring armor, inflicts Smoldering) and Immolating Breath (2 Actions, Reach: Cone 8, DC 20 DEX save, KEY d20 damage, half on save, Smoldering targets fail). You can maintain this form for as long as the temp HP granted by this spell remain (max. 10 minutes). When it ends, you drop to 0 HP.

name: Rimeblades
description: On hit: Slowed.

name: Snowblind
description: On hit: Blinded until the end of their next turn.

name: Frost Shield
reaction: When attacked, Gain 2xKEY temp HP and Defend for free.
description: The ice melts and these temp HP are lost at the start of your next turn.

name: Shatter
description: If any die rolls the max against a Hampered target, this counts as a crit. On crit: +20 damage.
upcast: Increase the result of ANY die by 1. +5 damage on crit.
notes: Hampered: Any creature with actions or movement reduced; e.g., Dazed, Slowed, Grappled, Restrained, Prone, in Difficult Terrain.

name: Cryosleep
description: Conjure razor-sharp icy spikes in 5 contiguous spaces within Reach; this area is difficult terrain. Creatures that enter these spaces (or who are in the area when you conjure them) suffer 2d6 damage for each space they touch.

name: Arctic Blast
description: This area is difficult terrain until the end of your next turn. Surviving creatures must make a STR save or be frozen in place (Restrained) until the end of their next turn; creatures already Hampered are Incapacitated for 1 turn instead.

name: Glacier Strike
description: Damage to creatures in a 3x3 area. Creatures adjacent to that area take half as much. The entire area permanently becomes difficult terrain.
notes: D66: Roll 2d6. The leftmost die is the tens place, and the second is the ones (e.g., 4 and 5 deal 45 damage).

name: Arctic Annihilation
description: Creatures in a 2x2 area within Reach are Dazed. On a failed STR save, they fall asleep instead, becoming Incapacitated until their next two turns have passed, until damaged, or until an ally uses an action to wake them. OR: Choose any number of objects or willing creatures within Reach to encase in ice. They are Incapacitated and immune to damage and negative effects until the start of their next turn. All other creatures and objects within Reach take d66 damage. Any surviving creature who took this damage must make a STR save or be Incapacitated for 1 round. Once you cast this spell, you must Safe Rest for 1 week before using it again.

name: Zap
description: On miss: the lightning fails to find ground, and strikes you instead.

name: Overload
description: Castable only if you are Charged, ending the condition.
notes: Charged: Whenever you take lightning damage, you are Charged for 1 minute.

name: Arc Lightning
description: The bolt also damages the next closest creature to your target. On miss: the lightning fails to find ground and strikes you instead.
notes: Next Closest: If you or an ally is the next closest, they are hit! If 2 creatures are equally close, the GM can roll for it or select the one wearing the most metal.

name: Alacrity
description: After damage is dealt, you gain the Charged condition then teleport anywhere within Range.

name: Stormlash
description: Surviving creatures are Dazed on a failed STR save, or Incapacitated instead for 1 of their turns if they fail by 5 or more. Creatures with a large amount of metal (e.g., armor or a longsword) roll with disadvantage.

name: Electrickery
description: Choose another creature within Range to swap places with your ally on a failed WIL save (they become the new target). Costs 1 Action while Charged, ending the condition.

name: Electrocharge
description: A creature you touch gains the Charged condition, +1 max action, +5 armor, 2x speed, and advantage on DEX saves.

name: Ride the Lightning
description: Teleport up to 12 spaces away to a spot you can see (if a willing creature is there, swap places with them). Adjacent creatures take damage. Surviving creatures must make a STR save or be hurled back 3 spaces, knocked Prone, and deafened for 1 day.
notes: D88: Roll 2d8. The leftmost die is the tens place, and the second is the ones.

name: Seething Storm
description: You become a cloud of tempestuous storm. You can fly, move for free 1/round, and attacks against you are made with disadvantage. At the end of each of your turns, strike up to 4 creatures within Reach with a bolt of lightning for d88 damage (a creature can only be struck 1/round). +2 Reach and number of bolts each round. Costs 3 actions each round to maintain. Once you cast this spell, you must Safe Rest for 1 week before you can use it again.

name: Razor Wind
description: Vicious: roll 1 additional die whenever you roll crit damage. Also damages up to 1 adjacent target.

name: Breath of Life
description: Restore 1 HP to a Dying creature.

name: Blustery Gale
description: Advantage against flying, Small, or Tiny targets. On hit: Move a Med target 2 spaces away; Small/Tiny twice as far; Large half as far (round down). For each die you would roll due to forced movement from this spell, deal +5 damage instead.

name: Barrier of Wind
reaction: When attacked at Range, Defend for free.
description: Ranged attacks have disadvantage against you this round (including the triggering attack).

name: Fly
description: Touch a creature, grant a flying speed of 12.

name: Eye of the Storm
description: Damage to enemies within Reach. You may place surviving creatures anywhere within 1 space of the storm's Reach on a failed STR save.

name: Updraft
description: Enemies within a 5x5 area must repeat a DEX save until they succeed. For each time they failed they suffer 1d6 falling damage and land prone.

name: Thousand Cuts
description: Also damages enemies within Reach 1 of your target.
notes: D44 with advantage: Roll 3d4 and drop the lowest die. The leftmost die is the tens place, and the second is the ones.

name: Boisterous Winds
description: You and up to 12 allies within Reach gain: Ranged attacks have disadvantage against you, a flying speed of 12, and can move for free 1/round.

name: Vicious Mockery
description: On hit: the target is Taunted during their next turn.

name: Rebuke
description: Does not miss. 2x damage against undead or cowardly (those Frightened or behind cover).

name: True Strike
description: Give a creature advantage on the next attack they make (until the end of their next turn).

name: Heal
description: Heal 1d6+KEY HP
upcast: Choose one: +1 target, +4 Reach, +1d6 healing. If 5+ mana is spent, you may also heal 1 negative condition (e.g., Blind, Poisoned, 1 Wound).

name: Warding Bond
description: Designate a willing creature as your ward for 1 minute. They take half damage from all attacks; you are attacked for the other half.

name: Shield of Justice
description: Reflect Radiant damage back at the attacker equal to the amount blocked (ignoring armor).

name: Condemn
description: Can only target an enemy that crit you or an ally since your last turn. Cannot be reduced by any means. The next attack against that enemy is made with advantage.

name: Vengeance
description: To a creature that attacked a Dying ally or reduced one to 0 HP since your last turn.

name: Sacrifice
description: Reduce yourself to 0 HP. You cannot have more than 0 HP until you Safe Rest. Heal a number of HP equal to your maximum HP, divided as you choose to any other creatures within Reach. You may revive a creature that has died in the past minute if you give them at least 20 HP (also healing 2 Wounds from them), provided they have not been revived with this spell before.

name: Redeem
description: Requires: A diamond worth at least 10,000 gp, which this spell consumes. Revive any number of deceased creatures you choose-within 1 mile-that have died in the past year, provided they have not died of old age or been revived with this spell before.

name: Lifebinding Spirit
description: Summon a spirit companion that follows you and is immune to harm. It lasts until you cast this spell again, take a Safe Rest, or it heals a number of times equal to the mana spent summoning it. Action: It attacks or heals a creature within Reach 4. It attacks for 1d6+WIL radiant damage (ignoring armor), or heals for the same amount.
upcast: Increment its die size by 1 (max d12), +1 healing use.
notes: Shepherd Only. Flavor is Free: Your Lifebinding Spirit can take the form of any small friendly animal. Outside of Combat: Your companion is a spirit, so it can pass through walls and dangers harmlessly.

name: Entice
description: On hit: target moves 2 spaces closer to you.
high_levels: Increment the die size 1 step every 5 levels (d6 » d8 » d10 » d12).

name: Withering Touch
description: On hit: Target is considered undead for 1 round.

name: Shadow Trap
description: The next creature to move adjacent to you suffers 3d12 damage; if Small or Tiny, it is also Restrained by shadowy tendrils for as long as you maintain concentration or until they escape.
upcast: +1 size category, +1d12 damage when they escape.

name: Dread Visage
description: Melee attackers are Frightened of you and suffer 1d12 damage if they attack you this round. Costs 2 mana less while dying.

name: Vampiric Greed
description: Gain 1 Wound. Heal HP equal to the damage done. Any surviving creatures make a STR save. Gain 1 additional Wound for each creature that saves.

name: Greater Shadow
description: Summon a 5d12 Greater Shadow minion (max 1) adjacent to you. When it dies, it explodes into 5 shadow minions (see Summon Shadow). Place them anywhere within 8 spaces.

name: Gangrenous Burst
description: Other damaged creatures must make a STR save or take damage, half on save. The save is rolled with disadvantage while Bloodied.

name: Unspeakable Word
description: On a failed INT save. Does not miss or crit. Target rolls with disadvantage if Bloodied or Frightened. On a success, you both take half of this damage instead.
notes: D66 with advantage: Roll 3d6 and drop the lowest die.

name: Creeping Death
description: If this kills the creature, it violently erupts and you MUST deal the same amount of damage to another creature within 8 spaces of it that has not yet been damaged by this effect. Repeat until a creature survives this damage or no other creatures are within Reach.

name: Shadow Blast
description: 1/round.

name: Summon Shadow
description: Summon a shadow minion within Reach 1 (max of INT or LVL minions). Minions have 1 HP, no damage bonus, and do not crit. They abandon you immediately outside of combat. Action: (1/turn) command ALL minions to move up to 6 then attack (Reach 1, d12 each).

name: Ice Disk
description: Conjure a disk of ice that floats just above the ground and follows you. It can carry up to 250 lbs./115 kg of weight for 1 hour or until you cast this spell again.

name: Chillcraft
description: Chill: Harmlessly freeze, thaw, or move a bath-sized amount of water near you. OR: Craft: Conjure a sheet of opaque, mirror-like, or transparent ice the size of a window or small door.

name: Wintry Scrying
description: Turn a small patch of water into a reflective icy mirror. Looking though it grants you vision of any desired location near this same body of water for 10 minutes.

name: Firebrand
description: Touch a surface and secretly mark it with a symbol or brief message. Speaking a chosen command word while nearby reveals it.

name: Fire Step
description: Teleport to a fire source you can see.

name: Kindle
description: Conjure a minor visual illusion. OR: Ignite a small, unheld item within Range 6.

name: Spark Buddy
description: Conjure a Tiny electrical helper for up to 1 hour. It can fetch Tiny objects (~1 lb./500 g max), open unlocked doors, illuminate a small area, or deliver a harmless shock. If it takes damage or moves further than 6 spaces away from you, it dissipates into sparks.

name: Spark Step
description: Teleport to a metal object.

name: Tempest's Command
description: Dispel a minor magical effect, or temporarily suppress a stronger one. OR: Voice of Thunder: Your eyes glow and your voice is amplified to a booming, thunder-like volume for 1 min.

name: Wind Whisper
description: You whisper a message into the wind and it will be secretly carried to a specified target within 100 miles/160 km.

name: Helpful Gust
description: Gently move a Tiny unheld item within Reach in any direction. OR: Generate an illusory scent.

name: Feather Fall
description: Cause them to gently float to the ground, unharmed.

name: Light
description: Cause an item to brightly glow as a torch with radiant light for as long as you hold it.

name: Beautify
description: Clean stains or repair a small tear/break in a non-magical item, or conjure tiny beautiful things: flowers, butterflies, etc.

name: Bond of Peace
description: Bond: Telepathically communicate simple thoughts or feelings with a friendly creature you can see. OR: Peace: Imbue your spoken words with calming magic, granting advantage on any check made to soothe anger or fear in creatures who can hear you.

name: Gravecraft
description: Gravemark: Soil a surface with blood, filth, or other disgusting things. OR: Gravework (Casting time 1 minute): Shape/move a body-sized plot of earth.

name: False Face
description: Change your appearance to look like someone else for 10 minutes. Requires a piece of them.

name: Thought Leech
description: Read the surface thoughts of a creature within Reach. Creatures can sense you doing this and may not like it.
